html:
10.13.18  2:55 am   Why are there so many questions?

     sometimes the same questions get repeated, making the amount of questions appear larger

10.13.18  2:52 am   are the chords to the "Oh No" part  of La de Dah just maj7 inversions ?

     no

      if so, that is deviously simple

10.13.18  2:42 am   I know that whenever someone asks you your favorite whatever, you always say that you'd prefer a new [thing] to be your favorite. But can you elaborate on what you mean by that?

     i think you are taking something out of context here

10.13.18  12:23 am   Oh my god. What is plastic made of??????

     scientists are trying to figure out. they used to know because they are the ones who made it in the first place, but now they can't remember. and they would like to know, so they can unmake it

10.13.18  12:21 am   Hey I'm bored and it's kind of late so can you tell me something incredibly inspirational?

     the entire world is inspirational but each person will be inspired by slightly different things at different times. the best strategy i've found is to not worry too much about which person will be inspired at which times by which thing. sometimes it will be completely unpredictable

10.13.18  12:19 am   Why don't you generally answer "favourites" questions?

     every time i pick a favorite, a different one becomes my favorite

10.13.18  12:02 am   What's your favourite saying

     hi/hello

10.12.18  11:26 pm   so my orchestra suddenly rescheduled our concert to this Monday what the heck am I supposed to do

     one option would be to go to the concert on monday but i'm not sure if that conflicts with your schedule

10.12.18  11:23 pm   why do i always love playing piano at night?:

     your imagination might be more vivid, with less outside light to distract

      every body starts going to sleep at night and then i get sad cause i was getting really into it and then i cant play

     you could use headphones

10.12.18  10:45 pm   have you ever thought of releasing an EP?

     i actually don't know what that is

10.12.18  10:14 pm   What should I do if I have an abnormally large right nasal hole and have nothing to hide it with? Do I embrace it or let myself slumber into the descending depths of the corner of my basement and my mind?

     you could become a motivational speaker

10.12.18  9:54 pm   whhhat would happen if instead of doing a half-step-up-key-change near the end of a song, you went a tritone up.

     you'll have to try it and find out

10.12.18  9:45 pm   If 2 was 3 would it be 4?

     not necessarily but maybe

10.12.18  9:36 pm   If you had triplets what would you name them?

     it seems inappropriate to name things before they are conceived

10.12.18  9:23 pm   What's your favorite part of making these kind of music videos?

     which kind

10.12.18  9:21 pm   Is pop a genre or is it just a way to categorize the popular songs of the time. Because I feel like the pop genre specifically is one that has really changed over time. Like if you look at songs from the late 2000s early 2010s and compare them to songs from today it's really a surprise to find out that they're the same genre because they're really quite different. Then if you go further back to the 80s for example you see that they're really different from today's music. Now that I think about it this is the same as with other genres as well. So with that being said do genres even exist?

     they may seem to exist only when the world is on pause

      If I'm listening to "closer" and I want more songs like that and I put on a pop playlist I'm gonna be really surprised when something like "wake me up before you go go" comes on because they're so different. So then shouldn't songs not be classified into just genres like pop and rock but rather genres AND their time period like 90s pop or 60s rock. Thoughts?

     classification systems are endless hours of fun, and yet they always fall apart. which is actually a blessing because you get to keep making more systems

     ALSO I've been thinking about this - how do you actually write a songs in a certain genre? Like???? What???? What makes a pop song pop or a rock song rock or a metal song metal (I'm talking in terms of just melody lyrics and chords)?

     you will have to contact the authorities on that one

      Is it just the production stage in which a song develops a genre? Like if I wrote a song and then made three different versions, one with synths and shit, one with some heavy guitar, and one with some sick beats, would I have one song in three different genres?

     it's your choice when you are filling out the registration form

     Or just one song? And if I just have one song what genre is that?????? I'm going crazy. How do you think you make a song a certain genre?

     first you must ascertain exactly what the client wants. if they can't give you a reference song to go from, you'll have to be deft at reading between the lines .....

10.12.18  9:20 pm   Have you ever tried writing a song around the visuals of the video, rather than making the visuals of the video around the song?

     not an entire song, but i have done music for videos that way

10.12.18  9:12 pm   what is the point of me

     individuality and self-awareness

10.12.18  8:39 pm   is the new song reminiscent of "when i'm 64"

     no

10.12.18  7:29 pm   What is a sound?

     i'm not sure

10.12.18  7:12 pm   Are you an abstract artist?

     i suppose i have that skill set

10.12.18  6:39 pm   I was looking in your section titled videos, and I was wondering about why the first video there is titled 'not so hard to do'.   

     that's the only words in it! seemed reasonable for that to be the title

      And, I'd like to add, I'm asking why you decided to name that video 'not so hard to do', not why is it the first one there, because I don't want you saying, because its the first one I made.   In case you were wondering why I didn't just say, why did you name your first video 'its not so hard to do' is because I didn't want your response to be, that isn't the first video I made.   I'd like to actually know, like was it you proving you could start doing videos, or was it decided by random, or something else like that.   Thank you, sorry if I seemed rude here, I'm just really interested as to the origin of that name.

     it was named based on the contents

10.12.18  5:35 pm   should i try learning songs from songbooks before i start transcribing songs myself? 

     either way should be good

10.12.18  4:33 pm   I think you have said that you typically use capitalization for emphasis, so I was wondering if you specifically make "i" lowercase in your videos, as a nod to not emphasizing yourself.   Sorry if the question didn't completely make sense.

     i have 3 reasons not to capitalize i.... 1. i don't have to. 2. capital i already looks like another letter. and 3. a lower case i is much more personal and has more personality because it has an eye

10.12.18  4:23 pm   Does your new song start with the word evil, elephants, elephant, eagle, eagles, or something else?

     something else

10.12.18  4:12 pm   10.11.18  9:18 pm   Well then freedom to what?

      play! all day, until the cows do or don't come home

10.12.18  4:08 pm   What are we missing?

     a link between the standard model and the other one

10.12.18  3:27 pm   I've had your latest song on repeat for days on end and I'm still not sick of it. How do you do it.

      the only way i know how to do it is just keep doing it, and have fun and take risks

10.12.18  3:16 pm   u happy now or what??

     yes and no

10.12.18  3:12 pm   How do I become a leader?

      where do you want to go

10.12.18  2:03 pm   Why the hell does "Take me home, country roads" by John Denver sound so homey? I don't listen to country music and I'm not even from the US but this song just has this certain homeyness to it. People from all sorts of countries have said the same. How does it do it? There must be something "universal" that the song is doing for people all around the world to feel so homey. All of that despite this sort of country music being arguably distinctly North American. What do you think that is? Is it the slow tempo?

     it is an average tempo, which could also be considered double or half depending on how you choose to write it down

      The relatively simple harmony?

     it is reasonably ordinary harmony

      Or is it the fact that country music is generally associated with peaceful landscapes, nature, a simple and happy lifestyle and stuff like that? Because there are a lot of songs that have that but don't make me feel the way this song does. I really can't put my finger on it and I'd appreciate your thoughts on it.

     they did a good job. if you do a good enough job in music you get a free pass across cultural boundaries. that is the highest honour (first prize)

10.12.18  1:54 pm   What are your opinions on the number 28.375

     it's 227 divided by 8

10.12.18  1:46 pm   Is a white horse a horse?

     let me do some calculations

10.12.18  1:37 pm   do you write the melodies or chords first?

     both at the same time

10.12.18  1:04 pm   E. Nothing else, just "E"

     that makes sense

10.12.18  1:00 pm   WhAt dO You ThiNK Of PeOple WRiTing LiKE tHis?

     seems legit

10.12.18  12:52 pm   A or B?

     i wonder if there is an intricate way to combine the 2 some how

10.12.18  12:51 pm   Can you teach me how to be decisive? I'm very indecisive and I think it's ruining my life.

     try setting a time limit on the decision

10.12.18  12:48 pm   How can I finally understand the covariant and contravariant properties of tensors?

     you're gonna have to experience it in real life

10.12.18  12:05 pm   Do you actually have "Duck Hunt" from the monday good trade video?

     it was just a picture but i think i still have the picture

10.12.18  11:57 am   Why would anyone ask a question without a question mark.

     to avoid redundancy?

10.12.18  11:12 am   You know, I just realized that when I read books I sort of adopt vocabulary and ideas from the book into me. So if I'm reading old English suddenly I'll be saying fun words like forthwith. Do similar things happen to you when you listen to other musics?

     yes

10.12.18  10:47 am   "wait a minute why do i have time to be at a party, i'm trying to do 10 weeks of work every 2 weeks "

Are you stressed out?

     yes but ferociously excited and thrilled at the same time

10.12.18  8:06 am   how to make breakfast

     sometimes it makes you

10.12.18  7:57 am   Is it legitimate to take words that don't rhyme and make them rhyme for the sake of a song

     sure

10.12.18  7:56 am   what two words would you never try to use in a song?

     it's fun to use any word. it's especially fun if you take words that you thought you didn't want, and then find their way into the song in the appropriate context. kind of like a villain, in a story. villains are bad (right?) so how come they always end up in the story

10.12.18  7:46 am   hey bill what are you having for dinner tonight

      lunch

10.12.18  7:38 am   10.12.18  1:32 am isn't it sad how making all this crazy content only makes you temporarily happy? Like barely.

     that's not true, and also the long term fulfillment is cumulative

      You finish it on time and you think "it's good enough" (because you said in the past that to make a truly perfect song/video you would have to spend your whole life just touching up tiny details, and you don't have that kind of time)

     it actually can make it worse when you spend too much time on the tiny details.... you might forget the important parts

      and then right after releasing your content you forget about it and move on to the next thing. I guess my question is: Do you really never stop for a second to appreciate what you've created?

     yes

10.12.18  7:09 am   Why do I keep having bad dreams? 

     to make your life seem nicer, by comparison

10.12.18  5:48 am   should I stay hopeful even if it may seem that lots of hope have been lost for me?

     sometimes it's interesting to find some new, fresh hope
